summary: 3 OF 4 POWER WINDOW UNITS HAVE FAILED MAKING THE WINDOWS INOPERABLE. FRONT PASSENGER WINDOW MOTOR AND REGULATOR WERE REPLACED UNDER WARRANTY. AT THIS TIME THE DRIVER AND REAR PASSENGER WINDOWS ARE INOPERATIVE. THE VEHICLE CURRENTLY HAS 43.3K MILES. BESIDES BEING INCONVENIENT, NOT BEING ABLE TO OPEN A WINDOW COULD POSE A SAFETY ISSUE IN AN EMERGENCY.   *NLM
